opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Cherokee Nation of Oklahoma v. Thompson, Secretary of Health and Human Services

opinion:
541 U.S. 934

CHEROKEE NATION OF OKLAHOMA ET AL.
v.
THOMPSON, SECRETARY OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, ET AL.

No. 02-1472.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 22, 2004.

1

C. A. 10th Cir. Certiorari granted, cases consolidated, and a total of one hour alloted for oral argument. Reported below: No. 02-1472, 311 F. 3d 1054; No. 03-853, 334 F. 3d 1075.
